structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Clerks, Attorneys And Other Officers Of Judicial Courts

law.text: When a rescript is filed in a case or proceeding in any court, the clerk, register or recorder of such court shall forthwith give notice thereof to an attorney of record of each party. The clerk of the supreme judicial court for the commonwealth shall transmit a copy of each rescript to the reporter of decisions.
